publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4581 Jackie Baillie: Village of the Year Awardsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Arrochar and Tarbet and Cardross for their recent success in the Calor Village of the Year competition; understands that Arrochar and Tarbet picked up an award for business and Cardross won the award for communication in the regional finals; further understands that Arrochar and Tarbet have beaten off stiff competition to become the overall winner in central region; notes that Arrochar and Tarbet were selected for their vibrant, enterprising and caring community, and wishes Arrochar and Tarbet the best of luck in the national final for Scottish Calor Village of the Year where it will be competing against other regional winners from across Scotland for the national title. Supported by: Jackson Carlaw*, Pauline McNeill*, David Stewart*, Ross Finnie*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Hugh Henry*
